Package eHealth

Class DoctorDB

java.lang.Object
eHealth.DBController
eHealth.DoctorDB
public class DoctorDB
extends DBController
This class is used to create the doctor table, and provide operations for querying the doctor table.
Author:
marin

  • Constructor Details

    • DoctorDB

      public DoctorDB()

  • Method Details

    • createDoctorDBTable

      public void createDoctorDBTable​(java.lang.String docType)

      Creating the doctor table

      The doctor table for the specified docType is created in the database if it does not exist already
      Parameters:
      docType - The sort of doctor

    • getDocLat

      public java.math.BigDecimal getDocLat​(java.lang.String doctype, java.lang.String whereCondition) throws java.sql.SQLException

      Getting the latitude of a doctor

      This method queries the doctor table, specified by the caller of the method, for the latitude of a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctype - The sort of doctor
      whereCondition - The where condition for the query
      Returns:
      The latitude of the desired doctor
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - If desired doctor was not found in the given table

    • getDocLon

      public java.math.BigDecimal getDocLon​(java.lang.String doctype, java.lang.String whereCondition) throws java.sql.SQLException

      Getting the longitude of a doctor

      This method queries the doctor table, specified by the caller of the method, for the longitude of a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctype - The sort of doctor
      whereCondition - The where condition for the query
      Returns:
      The longitude of the desired doctor
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - If desired doctor was not found in the given table

    • insertIntoDoctorDBTable

      public void insertIntoDoctorDBTable​(java.lang.String tableName, java.lang.String firstname, java.lang.String lastname, java.lang.String address)

      Inserting a doctor into a doctor table

      A doctor is inserted into a doctor table, using the attributes specified by the caller of the method.

      The latitude and longitude is calculated within this method, using OpenStreetMapUtils

      Parameters:
      tableName - The name of the table to insert into
      firstname - The first name of the doctor
      lastname - The last name of the doctor
      address - The address of the doctor

    • createPopulatedDoctorDB

      public void createPopulatedDoctorDB()

      Populating the doctor tables with data

      The doctors available in eHealth are hard coded into the database using this method.

      The methods "createDoctorDBTable" and "insertIntoDoctorDBTable", also part of this class, are used to populate the tables.

    • resultSetToTableModel

      public void resultSetToTableModel​(javax.swing.JTable table, java.lang.String tableName, java.lang.String whereCondition, User user, double maxDistance) throws java.sql.SQLException

      Populating a table(UI) with data retrieved from the doctor table

      A table from the UI is populated with the data of a doctor table from the database.

      Not all rows from the doctor table are also represented in the UI, only the rows which match the where condition and the max distance condition specified by the caller of this method.

      The distance between doctor and user is calculated within the method, using OpenStreetMapUtils.

      Parameters:
      table - The table to be populated
      tableName - The name of the table to extract data from
      whereCondition - The where condition for the query
      user - The user used, for determining the distance
      maxDistance - The maximum distance between doctor and user
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - If no data was found

    • displayListOfAllDBEntries

      protected void displayListOfAllDBEntries​(java.lang.String tableName)
      Description copied from class: DBController

      Displaying all entries of a database table on the console

      This method uses the provided table name to display all its data on the console.
      Specified by:
      displayListOfAllDBEntries in class DBController
      Parameters:
      tableName - The name of the desired table
